SA10n1062:10: tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ |
SA10n1062:16: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ |
SA10n1062:21: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti |
SA10n1062:25: ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati |
SA10n1062:27: yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
SA10n1062:28: evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām |
SA10n1062:38: te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca ||2 ||
SA10n1062:44: tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt |
SA10n1062:50: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1062:56: iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1062:62: yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati,
SA10n1062:68: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
SA10n1062:72: taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt,
SA10n1062:80: yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt,
SA10n1062:81: tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet,
SA10n1062:82: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet |
SA10n1062:86: sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate |
SA10n1062:89: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam |
SA10n1062:93: nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum - yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti,
SA10n1062:97: ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā |
SA10n1062:99: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1062:100: atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate |
SA10n1062:101: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA10n1062:105: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke - ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,
SA10n1062:107: atrāha - yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,
SA10n1062:110: kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo'sti,
SA10n1062:111: tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate,
SA10n1062:115: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā?
SA10n1062:120: anyavyapadeśa siddhayarthaṃ hi bhavatā anyatvaṃ parikalpyate |
SA10n1062:121: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
SA10n1062:122: yasmā llabdhānyavyapadeśa eva padārthe'nyasmin anyatvaṃ kalpyate,
SA10n1062:123: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
SA10n1062:125: tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati |
SA10n1062:126: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1062:129: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo'pi padārthoṃ nāstīti siddham ||
SA10n1062:132: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati,
SA10n1062:136: tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1062:141: iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam,
SA10n1062:142: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo'sti |
SA10n1062:143: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti |
SA10n1062:145: syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt |
SA10n1062:149: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate |
SA10n1062:151: sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā?
SA10n1062:153: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate |
SA10n1062:155: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate |
SA10n1062:156: evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10n1062:166: na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati |
SA10n1062:171: asati ca saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam?
SA10n1062:190: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści
SA10n1062:192: sattvu na asti karonti ca artham ||
